attributes.action: Introduce a higher minimum wage for public holidays.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Introducing a increased minimum wage for bank holidays including Christmas. This aims to encourage employers to acknowledge that it is a national holiday. Allowing the employees to take the day off or in places of work that have increased business in those times (such as catering or postal services) where closing would be damaging to business then a fair financal acknowlegdment should be in place to compensate for the lose of celebration.
